channel.title: Docker Compose on Juan's Tech Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Docker Compose on Juan's Tech Blog

item.title: How to Access Home Assistant Remotely.
item.description: Step-by-step guides to get a .PP.UA domain, set up Cloudfalre as your nameserver, configure Cloudflare Tunnel, install Cloudflare Tunnel docker client and configure Home Assistant.

item.title: Integrate SONOFF Zigbee USB Dongle 3.0 Plus-P into Home Assistant.
item.description: I just learned how to mount the Zigbee dongle into Docker container and integrate it into Home Assistant.
